weapons.name: Medium Pistol
weapons.description: A standard Medium Pistol fired using the Handgun skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 2, magazine size of 12, is concealable and has a 1 hand requirement.

weapons.name: Heavy Pistol
weapons.description: A standard Heavy Pistol fired using the Handgun skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 2, magazine size of 8, is concealable and has a 1 hand requirement.

weapons.name: Very Heavy Pistol
weapons.description: A standard Very Heavy Pistol fired using the Handgun skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, magazine size of 8, is not concealable and has a 1 hand requirement.

weapons.name: SMG
weapons.description: A standard SMG fired using the Handgun skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, magazine size of 30, is concealable and has a 1 hand requirement. This weapon is also capable of Autofire(3) and Suppressive fire.

weapons.name: Heavy SMG
weapons.description: A standard Heavy SMG fired using the Handgun skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, magazine size of 40, is not concealable and has a 1 hand requirement. This weapon is also capable of Autofire(3) and Suppressive fire.

weapons.name: Shotgun
weapons.description: A standard Shotgun fired using the Shoulder Arms skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, magazine size of 4, is not concealable and has a 2 hands requirement. In addition to Slugs, Shotguns can also fire Shotgun Shells. You can't make an Aimed Shot with a Shotgun Shell. When you fire a Shotgun Shell, you make 1 Ranged Attack. If successful every target in front of you, within 6m/yds (3 squares) takes 3d6 damage.

weapons.name: Assault Rifle
weapons.description: A standard Assault Rifle fired using the Shoulder Arms skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, magazine size of 25, is not concealable and has a 2 hands requirement. This weapon is also capable of Autofire(4) and Suppressive fire.

weapons.name: Sniper Rifle
weapons.description: A standard Sniper Rifle fired using the Shoulder Arms skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, magazine size of 4, is not concealable and has a 2 hands requirement.

weapons.name: Bows & Crossbows
weapons.description: A standard Bow or Crossbow fired using the Archery skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, is not concealable and has a 2 hands requirement.

weapons.name: Grenade Launcher
weapons.description: A standard Grenade Launcher fired using the Heavy Weapons skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, magazine size of 2, is not concealable and has a 2 hands requirement. All explosives weapons deal their damage to all targets (including the terrain) in a 10m/yd by 10m/yd area (5 Square by 5 Square), the center of which is your intended target.

weapons.name: Rocket Launcher
weapons.description: A standard Rocket Launcher fired using the Heavy Weapons skill. It has a Rate of Fire of 1, magazine size of 1, is not concealable and has a 2 hands requirement. All explosives weapons deal their damage to all targets (including the terrain) in a 10m/yd by 10m/yd area (5 Square by 5 Square), the center of which is your intended target.
